result.title: Cheating... Again!!!
result.content:
My friend, Mohammad_Yasser, wrote this blog 6 months ago when he caught a cheater whose handle is Solve_Every_Where

Now it's happening again ....

Today I caught the same user cheating, we were competing in a local contest held on CF after which I could realize that he's using my codes.

Actually this happened when we met once and I logged in using my account on his laptop, maybe he's using a key logger or something.

I reviewed some of his codes in some rated rounds and I can see no difference between his codes and mine.

I admit it's my mistake to fall on me such a classical trick, but it actually happened!
